My boyfriend and I both agree that this was the absolute best Margherita pizza either of us have ever had — and he’s a born and raised New Yorker! The crust was perfect, not too dense and not too light. The ingredients were fresh and the staff were friendly. The amaretto ice cream truffle was to die for, we’re planning on trying the pistachio on our next visit!
Piccolo has the best sausage pizza in NYC by far.
Ordered two pizzas, asked "no sauce", repeated twice, got confirmation "no sauce". Bright home two pizzas with sauce. Kids refuse to eat.
Great food, friendly staff, pizza was great & I got 2 free redbulls. Just scan the redbull advertising in the counter follow the link and boom free redbulls
Always great food and great service! The side of Spanish and the chicken all nonna were amazing!
Best ever, just amazing food and staff, lots of love

5 stars because of daym drops review, man that pizza looks good.

Got the lobster ravioli. Had 5 pieces of ravioli. Though I'd not a even a kid size portion. Who is giving this 5 stars for total rip off? Just go to the deli 5 minutes walk from here portion of great so is taste and quality.

Went I came to Roosevelt island for the first time, I came here with my family to eat. The pizza and food here is good! When we were done, I look out and see tons of kids playing in the sunshine. Life is good in Roosevelt Island.

We had the gluten free pizza , margarita and another pineapple pizza , both gluten free, it is not fresh dough , but it tasted good especially the margarita one, niceplace, if you live in the island or visiting ,
Very good
A decent place to get fresh Pizza!

(Translated by Google) Pleasant surprise, late at night, looking for a place for a quick dinner before taking the subway, small and in good taste, fast and courteous service, very good pizza. Ideal for the moment. Fair price.  (Original) Grata surpresa, tarde da noite, procurando um lugar para um jantar rápido antes de pegar o metrô, pequeno e de bom gosto, atendimento rápido e cortês, pizza muito boa. Ideal para o momento. Preço justo.

What I did to my large pizza slices is not what I wanna be talking about right now I ate over 10 slices in just 2 mintues how good is a cheese pizza is just nothing better it’s so good I can’t even describe it my self

(Translated by Google) Excellent, very rich and cheap, the perfect attention  (Original) Excelente, muy rico y barato, la atención perfecta

(Translated by Google) Very nice little restaurant. We went on a day trip to Roosevelt Island and came here. We got a nice window seat, very atmospheric and the food came very quickly. The taste was very tasty! Nice waiters and a very fair price. Gladly again!  (Original) Sehr schönes kleines Restaurant. Wir haben einen Tagesausflug nach Roosevelt Island gemacht und sind hier vorbei gekommen. Wir haben einen schönen Platz am Fenster bekommen, sehr atmosphärisch und das Essen kam sehr schnell. Geschmacklich war es sehr lecker! Nette Bedienungen und ein sehr fairerer Preis. Gerne wieder!
Small local pizza place.  We enjoyed the meat lovers pie.  Great service with beer on tap.
Delicious food
Very good place, correct portion for correct price! Helpful and careful waiter, delicious meals. We tried Calzone and other stuffed meals, it was one of the best I ever tried so far!
Great Italian food
Delicious pizza and fresh salad! Friendly service.
Cozy and cheap
Love the Sicilian pizza + excellent cold beers!
We tried the BBQ Chicken pizza.  It was good.  If you sit outside, you have a good meal with a beautiful view.
Ordered a cuppaccino to go. When opened there was no foam and hardly any coffee added...very dissatisfied. On the positive side,It was very hot and it was cold outside.
Very good pizza.clean but it's on Roosevelt Island.if you are in the arrea..food is worth it..
Good service, good food, good environment
Beautiful place, night time with the bridge lit up. So nice. Food was great. Had a Meatball & Pepperoni Pizza. Drinks service all above average. Clean place for sure. Important to add.

(Translated by Google) Excellent value for what you usually pay for New York. The salad and the pizza we ordered was delicious. In addition the treatment received was excellent. Highly recommended if you like Mediterranean food.  (Original) Relación calidad-precio excelente para lo que se suele pagar por Nueva York. La ensalada y la pizza que pedimos estaba riquísima. Además el trato recibido fue excelente. Muy muy recomendable si te gusta la comida mediterránea.
(Translated by Google) So pretty  (Original) Re lindo

(Translated by Google) Good combination of quality price. Good food .. Viviana attended us .. speaks Spanish .. excellent service  (Original) Buena  combinación  de precio calidad..comida buena.. nos atendió Viviana.. habla español.. excelente atención

Good service. Food was good. Certain things could've been better. The garlic bread was just a Italian roll with butter and some garlic on it. The grilled chicken in my salad was dry and hard. Waitress was great, place was clean.

This is a restaurant where I have been very often but have seen it slowly deteriorate. The next to last time I was there, the tomato sauce in the pasta was completely watery. Because I had been there previous times, I chose to overlook it and figured they had had a bad day. I went back with my friends visiting me from Spain (a couple and their son). The food was good, but when we got the check, the price seemed too steep. I looked at the check. They had included the tip (something never done before to me at this restaurant) and a fee “if we paid with credit card”. Yet, without knowing how we were going to pay, it was already added to the check. The waitress became very nasty when I simply inquired about both fees. She walked away. The manager came and said that it was “customary” to add a “tourist tip”. I told him that my friends were tourists, but I was not. I told him how disappointed I was in them, a place that I frequent rather often. He offered no apology. I asked him to remove the “tourist tip” and the credit card fee, since we would not be paying with credit card. I also told him that they had just lost a customer. We were never nasty with him, but I was stern and showed my disapproval and disappointment. He was forced the remove both fees, but never apologized or admitted to trying to rip us off, assuming I was a tourist. We got no apology. And when I told him that it was a shame that I would never return, he said that he did not care. What a horrible way to treat regular customers. I am very disappointed in them and hope the owner reads this review.

(Translated by Google) Excellent service, attention, very nice atmosphere, all very clean. The very divine food. Plated very nice to look at. 👍👍👍  (Original) Excelente servicio, atención, el ambiente muy agradable, todo muy limpio. La comida muy divina. El emplatado muy agradable a la vista. 👍👍👍
Slow service but the food was very good
Love the pizza Oscar is great
(Translated by Google) Very tasty pizza  (Original) Muy rica la pizza

Very good pasta and garlic bread. Nice and helpful service. Food doesn’t take long to come out. Good prices. Perfect place to eat after eating a the non-edible restaurant next door (do not recommend to anyone, unless you want to waste a lot of money). I’ll definitely be eating here next time.
(Translated by Google) Fabulous service!  (Original) ¡Servicio fabuloso!
Solid post-Softball hangout as long as your teammates are cool and you go with the Buffalo Chicken pizza.

Stopped in here with a client of mine for lunch. My client enjoyed his meal the pizza was ok needed to be crispier and less greasy, what I am dissatisfied with is the service server didn't say thank you to me but I noticed he said thank you to other patrons who weren't my skin color, and when he bought my clients food out he didn't even look at me nor speak loudly enough when he said mine was coming. I didn't like the treatment I got there when he bought my pizza to me he didn’t even tell me the pan was hot.  I don't normally complain but I feel it's because I was african American I saw how he treated the other patrons.
(Translated by Google) They speak Spanish and are very friendly. The food very rich. We loved it  (Original) Hablan español y son muy amables. La comida muy rica. Nos ha encantado
Good food with a view 😍 Loved the pizza and service was good , nice and calm environment both indoor and outdoor ♥️
The worst service ever . Felt the waitress is racist. Professionalism here  0/10 . Service 2/10 . Food quality 8/10 .
